PS9A.MU.summary: PT Perusahaan Perkebunan London Sumatra Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the plantation business in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Oil Palm Products, Rubber, Seeds, and Others. The company offers crude palm oil and rubber, as well as cocoa, tea, and oil palm seeds. It also develops plantations on behalf of local smallholders. As of December 31, 2019, the company had a total planted area of 115,665 hectares comprising 95,637 hectares of palm oil; 15,945 hectares of rubber; and 4,083 hectares of cocoa, tea, and other crops in North Sumatra, South Sumatra, East Kalimantan, North Sulawesi, South Sulawesi, and Java. In addition, it is involved in the research, processing, trading, marketing, industrial, and agency/representative activities; and invests in agricultural technology and cultivation, as well as agriculture, forestry, and fishery businesses. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Perusahaan Perkebunan London Sumatra Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Salim Ivomas Pratama Tbk.

PSDN.JK.summary: PT Prasidha Aneka Niaga Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the processing and trading of agricultural products in Indonesia. It offers crumb rubber; and produces instant and roasted ground coffee products, and coffee beans. The company is also involved in the coffee plantation. It exports its products to the United States, Europe, and Asia. The company was formerly known as PT Aneka Bumi Asih and changed its name to PT Prasidha Aneka Niaga Tbk in 1994. PT Prasidha Aneka Niaga Tbk was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PSGO.JK.summary: PT Palma Serasih Tbk engages in plantation, processing, and production of crude palm oil in Indonesia. It also exports its products worldwide. PT Palma Serasih Tbk was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

RANC.JK.summary: PT Supra Boga Lestari Tbk operates supermarkets in Indonesia. Its supermarkets offer meat, poultry, seafood, fruits, and vegetables, as well as other specialty products. The company operates its supermarket under the Ranch Market and Farmers Market names. It operates 48 stores consisting of 16 Ranch Markets, 29 Farmers Markets, 1 The Gourmet by Ranch Market, and 2 Day2Day by Farmers Market located in various cities in Jakarta, Jabodetabek, Surabaya, Malang, Balikpapan, Samarinda, Pekanbaru, Ambon, Dumai, and Palembang. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

RMBA.JK.summary: PT Bentoel Internasional Investama Tbk manufactures and distributes cigarettes in Indonesia and internationally. It offers a range of machine-made kretek, hand-made kretek, and white cigarettes under the Dunhill Filter, Dunhill Mild, Club Mild, Lucky Strike Mild, Neo Mild, Tali Jagat, Bintang Buana, Sejati, Star Mild, Uno Mild, Lucky Strike, Dunhill Regular, Dunhill Lights, and Dunhill Menthol brand names. The company was formerly known as PT Transindo Multi Prima Tbk and changed its name to PT Bentoel Internasional Investama Tbk in August 2000. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bentoel Internasional Investama Tbk is a subsidiary of British American Tobacco (2009 PCA) Ltd.

ROTI.JK.summary: PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk manufactures, sells, and distributes breads in Indonesia and the Philippines. The company offers white/sliced breads, sweet/filled breads, and cakes under the Sari Roti brand. It sells its products to distributors and agents. The company was formerly known as PT Nippon Indosari Corporation and changed its name to PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk in 2003. PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia.

SGRO.JK.summary: PT Sampoerna Agro Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates oil palm and rubber plantations, and palm oil mills in South Sumatera, West Kalimantan, Central Kalimantan, and Riau, Indonesia. The company offers crude palm oil, palm kernel, and germinated oil palm seeds, as well as non-palm oil products, such as rubber and sago starch. It is also involved in the utilization of forestry products; provision of management consultation service; and wholesale trade activities. The company produces and sells its oil palm seeds under the DxP Sriwijaya brand; and sago starch under the brand name Prima Starch. As of September 30, 2020, it total planted area included 119,176 hectares of oil palm inti plantations, sago plantations, and rubber plantations. The company was formerly known as PT Selapan Jaya and changed its name to PT Sampoerna Agro Tbk in 2007. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Palembang, Indonesia. PT Sampoerna Agro Tbk is a subsidiary of Sampoerna Agri Resources Pte. Ltd.

SIMP.JK.summary: PT Salim Ivomas Pratama Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated producer of edible oils and fats in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Plantations; and Edible Oil and Fats. The Plantations segment is primarily involved in the development and maintenance of oil palm, sugar cane, timber, and rubber plantations; and processing, trading, marketing, and sale of palm oil, sugar, and rubber products. This segment also develops and maintains cocoa, coconut, agroforestry, and tea plantations. The Edible Oil and Fats segment produces, markets, and sells edible oils, margarines, shortening, fats, and other related products, as well as other by-products derived from palm oil refining and fractionation. The company also provides transportation, investment and research management, and technical services; and artificial primary macronutrients mix fertilizers. In addition, it engages in bulking station business; seed breeding activities; and invests in agricultural technology and cultivation, agriculture, marketing and research businesses, as well as engages in the house prefabrication activities. The company offers its products under the Bimoli, Bimoli Spesial, Delima, Happy, Palmia, Amanda, Simas, Malinda, and Mahakam brand names. It also exports its products to approximately 25 countries, including China, Malaysia, Singapore, Nigeria, South Korea, Timor Leste, the Philippines, Myanmar, Sri Lanka, and Papua New Guinea. The company was formerly known as PT Ivomas Pratama and changed its name to PT Salim Ivomas Pratama Tbk in February 1994. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Salim Ivomas Pratama Tbk is a subsidiary of Indofood Agri Resources Ltd.

SIPD.JK.summary: PT Sreeya Sewu Indonesia Tbk produces processed and poultry feed in Indonesia. The company operates through Livestock Feed, Day Old Chicks, Dressed Chicken, and Partnership and Commercial Farm segments. It is also involved in breeding and hatchery; growing farm activities; and slaughtering and production of further processed and value added chicken products. In addition, the company offers laboratory services and medicine; and involved in the distribution and trading of poultry equipment, feedmill, and others product. Further, it engages in the frozen food processing industry. The company was formerly known as PT Sierad Produce Tbk and changed its name to PT Sreeya Sewu Indonesia Tbk in September 2020. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Sreeya Sewu Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Great Giant Pineapple.

SKBM.JK.summary: PT Sekar Bumi Tbk processes, produces, trades in, and distributes frozen food products in Indonesia. The company offers block packing, raw, and cooked shrimp, as well as cooked and peeled prawns; beef balls, sea food, fish balls, fish shiumai, hakau, kekian, martabak, mini wonton, nuggets, puffs, samosa, sausage, shiumai, shrimp balls, shrimp shiumai, spring rolls, and squid balls; and cheese and vegetable fish cake, brosur bumifood, dumpling ayam and udang, fish tofu, fish cake laksa recipe, scallop, shrimp and fish dumpling, and shumai. It also processes cashew nuts and other nut products; and bread crumbs and breaded shrimps. In addition, the company is involved in the agriculture, fisheries, aquaculture, trading, transportation, construction, services, printing, and workshop businesses. PT Sekar Bumi Tbk sells its products under the FINNA, SKB, Bumifood, and Mitraku brands. The company also exports its products to the United States, Europe, and other Asian countries. PT Sekar Bumi Tbk was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

SKLT.JK.summary: PT Sekar Laut Tbk produces and sells crackers, tomato and chili sauces, breads, and ready to use seasonings in Indonesia and internationally. The company provides cashew nuts, rice been and other beens, sardines, condiments, cooking spices, and Melinjo products under the Finna brand name. It also involved in the trading of consumer goods; and restaurant business. In addition, the company exports its products to the Netherlands, Korea, England, Oceania, China, and internationally. PT Sekar Laut Tbk was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

SMAR.JK.long_name: PT Sinar Mas Agro Resources and Technology Tbk
SMAR.JK.summary: PT Sinar Mas Agro Resources and Technology Tbk engages in the cultivation and harvesting of oil palm in Indonesia. The company also processes fresh fruit bunches into crude palm oil (CPO) and palm kernel; and refines CPO into value-added products, such as cooking oil, margarine, shortening, oleo-chemicals, and biodiesel. It offers cooking oil under the Filma, Mitra, Kunci Mas, and Palmvita names; margarines under the Palmboom, Palmboom Cake, Filma Prestige, Filma, Filma Danish Pastry, Menara, Menara Cream, Mitra, Smart Baker, and Palmvita names; and shortening products under the Filma Puff Pastry, Filma Baker's Cream Fat, Filma Butter Oil Substitute, Delicio White Baker's Fat, Filma GoodFry Deep Frying Fat, Goodfry Semi Liquid Frying Oil, Palmvita Deep Frying Fat, Palmvita White Fat, Palmvita Baker's Fat, Palmvita Gold Butter Oil Substitute, Menara, Menara Baker's Fat, Red Rose, and Filma Pusaka White Baker's Fat names. The company also provides specialty fats under the i-Soc CBS, i-Soc PCF, i-Soc CF, Delicio Coating Fat, and Delicio Toffee Fat names. In addition, it offers fractioned fatty acids, distilled fatty acids, glycerine, and soap noodles under the Sinar name; and palm kernel meals, olein, stearin, cocoa butter substitute, and soybean oil and soybean meals. Further, the company is involved in the cultivation of ornamental plants; provision of transportation services; and organic, oleo chemical, and bio energy businesses. As of December 31, 2018, it had a total planted area of approximately 106,637 hectares. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Sinar Mas Agro Resources and Technology Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Purimas Sasmita.

SSMS.JK.summary: PT Sawit Sumbermas Sarana Tbk., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of crude palm oil, fresh fruit bunches, palm kernel oil, and palm kernel in Indonesia. The company operates oil palm plantations and a palm oil mill. It is also involved in the provision of consulting and trading services. PT Sawit Sumbermas Sarana Tbk. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Pangkalan Bun, Indonesia.

STTP.JK.summary: PT Siantar Top Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells snacks in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Food Processing and Others. The company offers biscuits, rice, coffee, instant and snack noodles, pellets, vermicelli, crackers, wafers, and candies, as well as flour and seasoning products. It also exports its products in Asia and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia. PT Siantar Top Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Shindo Tiara Tunggal.

SZ31.F.summary: PT Sampoerna Agro Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates oil palm and rubber plantations, and palm oil mills in South Sumatera, West Kalimantan, Central Kalimantan, and Riau, Indonesia. The company offers crude palm oil, palm kernel, and germinated oil palm seeds, as well as non-palm oil products, such as rubber and sago starch. It is also involved in the utilization of forestry products; provision of management consultation service; and wholesale trade activities. The company produces and sells its oil palm seeds under the DxP Sriwijaya brand; and sago starch under the brand name Prima Starch. As of September 30, 2020, it total planted area included 119,176 hectares of oil palm inti plantations, sago plantations, and rubber plantations. The company was formerly known as PT Selapan Jaya and changed its name to PT Sampoerna Agro Tbk in 2007. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Palembang, Indonesia. PT Sampoerna Agro Tbk is a subsidiary of Sampoerna Agri Resources Pte. Ltd.

T2L.F.summary: PT Tunas Baru Lampung Tbk primarily manufactures and sells vegetable cooking oils in Indonesia. It operates through Plantations and Manufacturing segments. The company offers palm cooking oil, palm kernel oil, crude palm oil, stearine, fatty acid, crude coconut oil, glycerin, margarine, molasses, and sugar, as well as biodiesel, and laundry and cream soaps. It also engages in the plantation of palm oil and sugarcane. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TBLA.JK.summary: PT Tunas Baru Lampung Tbk primarily manufactures and sells vegetable cooking oils in Indonesia. It operates through Plantations and Manufacturing segments. The company offers palm cooking oil, palm kernel oil, crude palm oil, stearine, fatty acid, crude coconut oil, glycerin, margarine, molasses, and sugar, as well as biodiesel, and laundry and cream soaps. It also engages in the plantation of palm oil and sugarcane. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TCID.JK.summary: PT. Mandom Indonesia Tbk manufactures and trades in cosmetics for men and women in Indonesia. It offers hair, face, and body care products, as well as deodorants, fragrances, and air fresheners. The company markets its products under the Johnny Andrean, Tancho, Fresh n Fresh, Lucido~L, Pixy, Pucelle, Glazelle de Pucelle, Miratone, Lovillea, GATSBY, Mandom, Spalding, Axya, Oxxo, and Style Up brands. T. Mandom Indonesia Tbk also exports its products to the United Arab Emirates, Japan, Malaysia, Thailand, the Philippines, India, Singapore, Korea, Vietnam, China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. The company was formerly known as PT Tancho Indonesia and changed its name to PT. Mandom Indonesia Tbk in 2001. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Mandom Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Mandom Corporation.

TGKA.JK.summary: PT Tigaraksa Satria Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the sale and distribution of various consumer products in Indonesia. It operates through Food and Consumer Products, Gas (LPG) and Other Kitchen Appliances, and Books segments. The company sells and distributes food products and consumer products; and educational products, as well as produces powdered milk. It also manufactures and distributes gas stoves; and distributes blenders and rice cookers, as well as offers gas refill services for households. The company offers its products to wholesalers, agents and sub distributors, general trade, medical outlets, hypermarkets, convenient stores, supermarkets, and minimarkets. PT Tigaraksa Satria Tbk was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

UCID.JK.summary: PT Uni-Charm Indonesia Tbk operates in the sanitary napkin industry in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Diapers and Non Diapers. The company engages in the manufacture and sale of sanitary napkins, night wings, panty liners, and baby diapers. It also offers non-woven and tissue papers. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Uni-Charm Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Unicharm Corporation.

ULTJ.JK.long_name: PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk
ULTJ.JK.summary: PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the food and beverage industry in Indonesia. The company operates in two segments, Beverages and Foods. It produces various beverages, such as milk, fruit juices, tea, traditional drinks, and health drinks; and sweetened condensed milk, powder milk, and tropical fruit juice concentrates. The company also offers milk products under the Ultra Milk and Ultra Mimi names; tea products under the Teh Kotak name; drinks and other health beverages under the Sari Kacang Ijo and Sari Asem names; and sweetened condensed milk under the Ultra Milk and Cap Sapi names. In addition, it provides freight and other services; and air and water management services, as well as engages in agriculture, dairy farm, and trading activities. Further, the company produces powder milk products through other parties for toll packing services. The company sells its products directly through retail outlets, food and beverages stores, kiosks, and its sales force; and indirectly through agents/distributors, minimarkets, supermarkets, and hypermarkets. It also exports its products. PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.

UNLRF.summary: PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk engages in the manufacture, marketing, and distribution of consumer goods in Indonesia. It offers soaps, detergents, dairy based foods, ice creams, cosmetic products, tea based beverages, and fruit juices, as well as leases office space. It offers its products under the Pepsodent, Lux, Lifebuoy, Dove, Sunsilk, Clear, Rexona, Vaseline, Rinso, Molto, Sunlight, Wall's, Royco, Bango, and other brands. The company founded in 1933 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Unilever Indonesia Holding B.V.

UNLRY.summary: PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk engages in the manufacture, marketing, and distribution of consumer goods in Indonesia. It offers soaps, detergents, dairy based foods, ice creams, cosmetic products, tea based beverages, and fruit juices, as well as leases office space. It offers its products under the Pepsodent, Lux, Lifebuoy, Dove, Sunsilk, Clear, Rexona, Vaseline, Rinso, Molto, Sunlight, Wall's, Royco, Bango, and other brands. The company founded in 1933 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Unilever Indonesia Holding B.V.

UNSP.JK.summary: PT Bakrie Sumatera Plantations Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the plantation, processing, and trading of agricultural and industrial products in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Palm Oil and Derivatives, Rubber, and Oleochemical. The Palm Oil and Derivatives segment processes, markets, and sells palm oil, as well as develops and maintains palm oil. Its palm oil derivative products and palm kernel oil are used in food and non-food industries, including cooking oil, margarine, ice creams, soaps and detergents, animal feeds, cosmetics, industrial lubricants, and bio-fuels. The Rubber segment processes, markets, and sells rubber products for use in footwear, gloves, contraceptives, and other industries, as well as develops and maintains rubber. The Oleochemical segment processes, markets, and sells oleochemicals that are used as raw materials for various fast moving consumer goods. The company also provides financial services for issuing bonds; and industrial estate management services, as well as processes fatty acids and distillate, fatty alcohols, glycerin, and palm stearin and olein. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as United Sumatera Plantations and changed its name to PT Bakrie Sumatera Plantations Tbk in 1991. PT Bakrie Sumatera Plantations Tbk was founded in 1911 and is headquartered in Kisaran, Indonesia.

UNVR.JK.summary: PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk engages in the manufacture, marketing, and distribution of consumer goods in Indonesia. It offers soaps, detergents, dairy based foods, ice creams, cosmetic products, tea based beverages, and fruit juices, as well as leases office space. It offers its products under the Pepsodent, Lux, Lifebuoy, Dove, Sunsilk, Clear, Rexona, Vaseline, Rinso, Molto, Sunlight, Wall's, Royco, Bango, and other brands. The company founded in 1933 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Unilever Indonesia Holding B.V.

WAPO.JK.summary: PT Wahana Pronatural Tbk trades in agriculture and marine products in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Sales Agrobisnis Product and Candy. It trades in dried seaweeds, cashew nut, rice, corn, coffee, and soybeans. The company also manufactures and sells candies under various brands. In addition, it engages in the agricultural products, coffee and mining commodities, industrial, transportation, and printing activities; and general contracting business. The company was formerly known as PT Wahana Phonix Mandiri and changed its name to PT Wahana Pronatural Tbk in June 2012. PT Wahana Pronatural Tbk was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

WICO.JK.summary: Pt Wicaksana Overseas International Tbk engages in the distribution and trading of food, beverage, and other products in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Distribution and Trading Centre. The company also offers snacks, beverages, milk powder, instant noodles, personal care products, cosmetics, medicine, household products, cooking oil, and plastic and electrical materials, as well as patient, commercial, and regulatory support services. It operates a network of 46 distribution centers. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. Pt Wicaksana Overseas International Tbk is a subsidiary of DKSH Holding AG.

WIIM.JK.summary: PT Wismilak Inti Makmur Tbk manufactures and trades in cigarettes in Indonesia. It offers hand-rolled and machine-rolled cigarettes, cigars, and filter rods. The company markets and sells its products under the Galan Kretek, Wismilak Spesial, Wismilak Slim, Wismilak Diplomat, Diplomat Mild, Diplomat Mild Menthol, Wismilak Premium Cigars, and Wismilak Premium Seleccion brands. PT Wismilak Inti Makmur Tbk was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.
